title: Taapsee Pannu: ‘The Ghazi Attack’ box-office collection Day 1 | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
text: Emotional Anil Kapoor breaks down at 'Mirzya' music launch event ‘The Ghazi Attack’ box-office collection Day 1 The first Indian film on war at sea ‘The Ghazi Attack’ opened to a lukewarm response at the box office. TNN | Feb 18, 2017, 03.39 PM IST The first Indian film on war at sea 'The Ghazi Attack' opened to a lukewarm response at the box office. The Hindi version of the film collected a total of Rs 1.25 crore at the domestic box office, as reported by Boxofficeindia.com. The film is bilingual and also released in Telugu. It is directed by debutant Sankalp Reddy . According to the producers of the film, it has collected a total of Rs 4.25 crore in India and the Hindi version of the film has managed to make Rs 1.65 crore. Starring Rana Daggubati , Taapsee Pannu , Kay Kay Menon , Rahul Singh and Satyadev Kancharana , 'The Ghazi Attack' is based on mysterious sinking of PNS Ghazi during the 1971 Indo-Pak War. The release of 'The Ghazi Attack' coincided with the release of two more film 'Irada' and 'Running Shaadi'. Interestingly, Taapsee Pannu features in both 'Running Shaadi' and 'The Ghazi Attack'.
